document_data.name: Candle Mold
document_data.mainbody: '''Candle molds''' were a variety of [[mold (item)|mold]] designed specifically for the shaping of [[candle]]s from [[tallow]] or [[wax]].
document_data.Description: Sometimes made of wood, these molds varied in the length, quantity, and style of candles they could produce.
document_data.Availability: * ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold a particularly large candle mold at a price of 12 [[silver piece]]s. It could make eighteen tallow or wax candles at a time, all measuring {{SI|4|ft|long=yes}} in length, but required {{SI|1|lb|long=yes}} of either material. The Catalogue lauded them as being favored among innkeepers and custodial [[priest]]s and advertised them as being capable of keeping a mansion fully stocked.
